questiontext.text:
The length of time it took for a number of doctoral students to complete their doctoral research was determined. The results are shown in the following table:

————————— — —- —- —- — — Duration of doctoral research 3 4 5 6 7 8 Number (in percent) 2 24 42 22 8 2 ————————— — —- —- —- — —

Indicate which statement about the mode and median of the given table, is correct.

answer.text: The mode is smaller than the median

feedback.text: The mode is smaller than the median: Incorrect
The mode and median are equal: Correct

answer.text: The mode is larger than the median

feedback.text: The mode is larger than the median: Incorrect

answer.text: Mode and median are not comparable here

feedback.text: Mode and median are not comparable here: Incorrect
